name: Currency Converter – MyShopKit
author: wiloke

sections.description:
The first and foremost step towards expanding your business globally is making it user-friendly for global customers. Customers from different corners of the world want to see the displayed price in their domestic currency. This helps save them from the hassle of converting currency mentally, especially those who don’t have a head for figures. Thus, customers will feel more comfortable browsing your products and more likely to make a purchase.

Multi Currency Converter will help you to do without coding required!!

Try the Demo |
Documentation |
PRO version

Important Notice:

  • Plugin works based on WooCommerce 3.x plugin.
  • It is released on WordPress.org and you can use plugin as free to build themes for sale.
  • Many styles and advance features are only available on pro version.
  • You must use PHP 7.4 or higher version

Multi Currency Converter features

► Multi Position: You can add Multi Currency Converter to top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right on
your shop.
► Switcher Currency when hovering: Multi Currency Convert Control appears when hovering on the price.

► Switcher Styles: The App offers up to 6 unique Switcher Control styles.
► Converting Everywhere: Multi Currency Convert not only converts the Product Price, but also converts money
that you insert into the product information. Hovering on the money below to see how it works:

Documentation

  • Getting Started

Plugin Links

  • Project Page
  • Documentation
  • Report Bugs/Issues
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the download package
  2. Upload myshopkit-multi-currency-converter-wp to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
